Description: Pale green glazed composition shabti of the God's Father of Amun, Bakkhons.
Curator's comments: The collection contains four other shabtis of the same man (EA 50106, 71108, 71154 and 71156). The collection also includes four shabtis in a different style of a God's Father of Amun, Bakenkhons, but probably this is a different individual (EA 54839, 68605, 68606 and 71104).
